info.smart_tools.smartactors.utils

Class Observable<TObservable extends Observable,TState>

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.smart_tools.smartactors.utils.Observable<TObservable,TState>
  • Type Parameters:
    TObservable - concrete type of this object
    TState - state that will be exposed
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComputationalUnit, Mailbox

    public abstract class Observable<TObservable extends Observable,TState>
extends Object
    Base class for objects that can expose their state changes to concerned objects (see Observer).
